step_feedback.feedback: Good job starting with fists clenched and arms drawn in. Keep those muscles tight as you inhale.
Nicely done opening your hands and extending your arms. Remember to exhale as you relax and open.
Great work on the outward arm movement. Focus on keeping your fingers open and arms straight at shoulder height.
You're maintaining good form here. Ensure your arms are fully extended horizontally.
Excellent completion of the first repetition! You're following the instructions well.
Second rep starting strong! Keep those fists closed and muscles tight as you inhale.
Good job opening your hands and extending. Remember to exhale and relax as you move your arms out.
You're doing well with the outward movement. Focus on maintaining open fingers and straight arms at shoulder height.
Keep up the good work on the horizontal extension. Ensure your arms are fully extended.
Fantastic job completing both repetitions! Your movements were consistent and followed the exercise cues.

exercise_summary: You did a great job with the Horizontal Pumping exercise! Remember to keep your fists tight and muscles engaged as you inhale, then open your hands and relax as you exhale. Focus on extending your arms straight out to shoulder height.
